title: Secondary screen / adapter (Windows)
body: Is there a way how to play fullscreen on secondary monitor instead of default one? I am not asking about borderless windows, switching the default monitor in the OS configuration or another tricks. Just changing the game configuration in order the DXGI uses another adapter or output.

replies.body:
Prynce with the assist! 

League will always use whichever monitor is set as the default display. The simplest way to get what you need done will be to go into your OS settings and set that second monitor as the main display.

No, your best bet is to actually just set your secondary monitor as your main display. It is pretty straight forward and the most convenient, and there isn't a configuration with the client you can make for it to use your secondary monitor as the medium.
